HTML Deltas Toolset

Often, you'll find yourself needing to make specific updates to the UI without destroying some part of the active state - values in input boxes, scrollbar positions, selected menu items, etc. To get that finer-grained control, Grimwire provides the "application/html-deltas+json" content type.

HTML Deltas is a simple data structure which describes ordered operations on the DOM. Every operation takes a selector (automatically scoped to the target region) and some parameters. The schema is defined as follows:

[
  ['operation 1', 'selector', 'param1', 'param2', ...],
  ['operation 2', 'selector', 'param1', 'param2', ...],
  ...
]
response.writeHead(200, 'ok', {'content-type':'application/html-deltas+json'});
response.end([
  ['replace', '#status', '<span class="label label-success">All clear!</span>'],
  ['addClass', '.connection', 'available']
]);

An example of using HTML Deltas


Supported Operations

The following operations are currently available:

OperationParametersBehavior
replaceHTMLReplaces the innerHTML of the target element(s)
appendHTMLAppends to the innerHTML of the target element(s)
prependHTMLPrepends to the innerHTML of the target element(s)
removeRemoves the target element(s)
addClassclass(es)Adds the given classes to the target element(s)
removeClassclass(es)Removes the given classes from the target element(s)
toggleClassclass(es)Toggles the given classes on the target element(s)
setAttributeattribute, valueSets the the value of the given attribute of the target element(s)
navigateURLTriggers a GET request on the target client region
target must be a child region of the current region
